titleStmt.title: SII 6.438: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 438. (A.R. No. 3 of 1899). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE APATSAHAYESVARA TEMPLE AT ALANGUDI, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kaṭalcuḻnta pārmātarum pūmātarum kalaimātarum Aṭalcūḻnta pormātaruñ cīrmātarum Aman=tuvāḻa nāṟkaṭalcūḻ puviyeḻum pāṟkaṭalpol
pukaḻ parappa Ātiyukamāmena cotimuṭi puṉain=taruḷi Aṟucamaiyamum Aimpūtamum neṟiyilil niṉṟu pālippa tennavarum cerallarumim ciṅkaḷarum mutalāya man=navaru n=tiṟai cumantu van=ti
ṇṭi cevikka ŪḻiŪḻi Oruceṅkol Eḻupārum Inittaḷippa cempoṉvirasiṁhāsanattu Ulakuṭai mukkokiḻānaṭikaḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya korājakesaripanmarāna ti
ripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ matiraiyumiīḻamum koṇṭaruḷaina śrīIrācātirācatevaṟkku yāṇṭu patinoṉṟāvatu nāḷ 100 8 10 2 ṉāl Iṭṭa niṉaippiṉpaṭit taṇṭa tiruvāymoḻintaruḷi pra
sādaMcetaruḷi van=ta tirumukappaṭi tiripuvanaccakkaravatti koneriImmaikoṇṭāṉ cuttamalivaḷanāṭṭu muṭicconāṭṭu Ālaṅkuṭiyāna jananātaccatuppetimaṅkalattu
sabhayarkku taṅkaḷūr pottakappaṭi nilam nālāyirattu nūṟṟirupattāṟe mukkāle Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇi kiḻaraikku patiṉoṉ tal kaṭamai Iṟukkummi
ṭattu muṉpu Oṭṭupaṭiyāy Iṟuttuvarukiṟa nel nūṟāyirattu Aṟupattueḻāyirat torunūṟṟu nāṟpatteṇ kalatti mīṉpāṭṭamu
ṭṭaṉa Avaiyiṟṟālum kācu Āyirattu toḷāyirattu Orupatteḻu Itil nūṟṟu nāṟpatteṇ kala miṉpāṭṭattāl kācu muṉṉūṟṟa m ceṅkaḻunir
nilattāl ālum taviṉtu nikki niṉṟa nellu muṉnūṟāyirattu Aṟupatteḻāyirak kalamum Iṟaiyiliyāl kācu nānūṟṟu muṉṟum koṭiyālum puṉpayirālum kācu Āyirattorunū
ṟ ṟeḻupattu muṉṟaraiyum Āka kācu Āyirattu Aiññūṟṟeḻupat tāṟaraiyum nālāvatu Eṇṇina kamukāy kaṭamaikoṇṭu varukiṟa kamuku Irupatteḻāyiratteṇṇūṟṟu muppatu Uḷpaṭa
nāṟpatināyiram kamuku mutalkoṇṭu Ikkamukukku kamuku Oṉṟukku pākku nāṉūṟāka van=ta pākkum taṇṭu mutalāy Iṟukkavum Ippaṭi Iṟukkumiṭattu kārmaṟuvum Orupūvum koṭiyum
ṇṭum payirceyalām nilam payirccetu paṭṭappāḻilum puṉcainilattilum viḷai nilattilum kamuku Iṭalām nilam kamu Iṟukkavum pākku kaṭamai Iṟukkum Iṭattu pattāvatuvaraiyum kaṭa
maikoṇṭu vanta kamuku Irupatteḻāyiratteṇṇūṟṟu muppatukkum patinonṟāvatumutal muḻuvaricaiyākavum nikki ni Iraṇṭāyirat torunūṟṟu muppatu kamukum Itaṉ Etirāmāṇṭu
mutal Āṇṭu Onṟukku Iraṇṭāyiram kamukākavum mutalkoṇṭu mutalkoṇṭa Āṇṭu mutal Āṟāmāṇṭu On Oṉṟu pātiyum Itan Etirāmāṇṭu Onṟumukkālum Itan Etirāmā
ṇṭumutal nirappavum Iṟukkavum kārukku munpu Iṟut ne teḻunūṟṟaṟupattaiṅkala nellu Iṟukkavum Iṟukkumiṭattu patinonṟāvatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu
toṇṇūṟāyirat taiyyāyirakkalanellum Itan Etirāmāṇṭumutal nā Iṟuk Iṟaiyilikkum koṭikkum puṉpayirukkum muṉpu Iṟuttuvarukiṟa kācu Iṟukkavum viḷainilattu kamuki
ṭṭa nilattukku kamukukku kaṭamai koḷḷaveṇu meṉṉāte viḷainilattukku Iṟuttuvarukiṟapaṭiye Iṟukkavum Ūrkiḻiṟaiyiliyāl kācu nāṭu koḷḷa niccayittapaṭiye Iṟukkakaṭavatāka colli Ippaṭi kaṇakkilu
m Iṭṭukoḷḷakaṭavarkaḷāka varikkukūṟiu cevārkaḷum coṉṉom taṅkaḷukku Ippaṭi kaṭamai Iṟukkavenṟu Eḻitināṉ tirumantiraolai minavaṉ muventa veḷāṉa Eḻuttu nilakaṅkaraiyarum kaḷappāḷarāyarum malaiyappiyarāyarum kaṉakarāyarum kāli
ṅkarāyarum maḻavarāyarum vāṇātarāyarum paḻantiyarāyarum Eḻuttiṭṭu prasādam cetaruḷi pontatu ... prasādañceytaruḷina tirumu veṭṭukaveṉṟu sabhaiyār Aruḷicceya kalveṭṭineṉ Ivvūr cilpācāri
yakkāṇiyuṭaiya san=tuyan Uṭaiyānāna ciriḷaṅkovācāriyaneṉ . pacānam Iṟukkum nel Iraṇṭunūṟāyirattu Aṟupatteḻāyirakkalam Itil maṟuvil Iṟukkum nel l nū
ṟṟu Aṟupattaṟukalane Irutūṇi nikki Orupūvil Iṟukkum nel Iraṇṭunūṟāyirattu muṉnūṟṟu muppattumukkalane tūṇi Ippaṭi Iṟuppatu .
Digital edition of SII 6.438 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
